Uses of Package
logic

  • Classes in logic used by logic 
    Class and Description
    Character
    This class is an abstract class that will be the base for every character in game, giving basic movability to the character.
    Door
    This class represents a possible exit on the Map where the Hero can go in order to complete the current level
    Drunken
    This class represents a specific type of Guard (enemy).
    Game
    This class is responsible for the game loop.
    Guard
    This class represents a specific type of Character.
    GuardPersonality
    This enum defines the possible types of Guards.
    Hero
    This class represents a specific type of Character.
    Map
    This class is the text based storage for the in game characters/objects locations on the current Game being played.
    Ogre
    This class represents a specific type of Character.
    Rookie
    This class represents a specific type of Guard (enemy).
    Suspicious
    This class represents a specific type of Guard (enemy).
    Unlocker
    This class is used to represent possible exits openers for the Hero on the current Map.
    Weapon
    This class represents a weapon in the in the game.
